name: Warlord Video Game Project
blurb: Warlord will be a fast paced tactical RTS game.  The focus of the game will be on the battle and the economy will be driven in a unique way.

rewards.reward: Our thanks in the form of your name in the credits.
Get a free copy of the game on PC or Mac when it's released.  This is 5 dollars less than it will retail for!
Get a copy of the game as above, and you'll be asked to beta test the game before release.
You get the Game when released, Beta access, and a copy of the original Warlord War Torn Taltos 2.0 rulebook.
Savage Supporter:  Get your name in the credits and a copy of the Warlord Savage North expansion book.
You get the Game, Beta access,  copy of the original Warlord 2.0 rulebook, and a copy of the upcoming Savage North expansion.

You get all of the above (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track) and you get a pewter miniature of each Warlord that we feature in the game!  This will be 9 metal figures of the iconic leaders of Taltos!

You get all of the above  (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures) and you get to do the voice of one of our characters in the game.  This is your chance to be the voice for the Warlord unit of your choosing!

You get all of the above(Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character) and you get to pick a faction from Warlord and we'll send you an entire 1,000 point army.  This army can be from the savage north or war torn Taltos!  The important part is that it's your opportunity to pick up the army you've been wanting and help out an indie developer!

You get all of the above (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character, a 1,000 point army) and the Development team will paint your 1,000 point army to the color scheme of your choosing.  Where else are you going to get an entire Warlord Army painted for $50 bucks?  No where.  \r\n

You get all of the above (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character, a 1,000 point army) and a professional miniature painter will paint your 1,000 point army to the color scheme of your choosing.  James Degenhardt has decided to help us out with painting some of the armies, and his usual commission ranges in the 15-25 a piece, so order this reward now and get him at one hell of a discount.

You get all of the above (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character, a PAINTED 1,000 point army) and you get access to our Design forums will you will be able to give your input on how the game play mechanics will come together.  Oh yeah...  You also get all of our future games for free.  Anything and everything that we ever release in the future is free to you.  Expansion packs, free.  Sequels, free.  New games, free.  Forever.

You get all of the above (Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character, a PAINTED 1,000 point army, access to the Design forums, and FREE games from us forever) and I will hand deliver the books, painted army, and Warlord figures.  While I'm at your home I will complete an entire days worth of odd jobs, from mowing your lawn, to washing your car.  Or we can game all night and all day with your newly painted warlord army.  I will also bring the latest build of the video game so that you get the first hands on experience with it!  If possible, other Too Late Developers will join me.\r\nThis reward is limited to the continental United States.

You get all of the all of the above minus the visit from us(Game, Beta access, Taltos Book, Savage North Book, and Sound Track, 9 Warlord Figures, voicing of an in game character, a 1,000 point PAINTED army, access to the Design forums, free video games that are made by us FOREVER) and we'll buy your plane ticket and hotel for a free trip to Reaper Con in 2011!  If you do not live in the continental United States we will buy half of your plane ticket.
